alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 11:59AM CST until March 13 at 11:51PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Agriculture flooding is occurring near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 26.0 29.3 Thu 11 am CS 30.1 28.2 25.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 800 PM CST.
